title: Overhyped
review: Overhyped movie. Felt more like action than horror.. First movie I ever felt asleep watching.. The second time was on IT 2 which was even worse.

title: Chaotic stupid movie.
review: A movie promoted and praises by angry feminists while the ordinary people yawn in the cinema. Don't waste your money spend it elsewhere.

title: Fell asleep in the cinema.
review: Fell asleep in the cinema wake up and saw other people sleeping, felt like a day had passed when the movie was over.
